description: With [add-ons](https://v2.developer.pagerduty.com/v2/page/api-reference#!/Add-ons/get_addons), third-party developers can write their own add-ons to PagerDuty's UI. Given a configuration containing a src parameter, that URL will be embedded in an iframe on a page that's available to users from a drop-down menu.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Name.description:
The name of the add-on.
* `src` - (Required) The source URL to display in a frame in the PagerDuty UI. `HTTPS` is required.

Src.description: The source URL to display in a frame in the PagerDuty UI. `HTTPS` is required.
